amendment.description: Amendment provides States the flexibility to contract out administrative functions of SNAP.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 115-679 to provide states the flexibility to contract out administrative functions of SNAP.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 192 (Roll no. 196).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Faso.
